description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biteship Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo: from n/a through 2.2.24.

product.name: Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo
